pages.text: Comforts adds ways to sleep comfortably.$(br2)Be it in a sleeping bag, to pass the night in the wild, or in a hammock, to pass the day.
Hammocks need to be hung up. Make a hammock, then rope and nails, find two trees and span the hammock up between them.$(br2)There need to be 4 blocks, in a straight line, between those trees.
